items.content_html:
RT‚ÄÇEva Foùïè ü¶ä Claudius Nero's Legion
Elon Musk: Starlink is going to do a tremendous amount of good

‚ÄúStarlink is good in and of itself. The Starlink system provides low-cost, high-bandwidth connectivity anywhere in the world. It's the first truly global Internet system.

And I think it's helping a lot of people around the world who either don't have access to connectivity, or it's too expensive. You know, once you have access to the Internet, you can learn anything. You can sell your products and services to the rest of the world.

So, I think Starlink actually is going to do a tremendous amount of good in lifting people out of poverty and helping them.‚Äù

- Require citizenship verification to register to vote
- Require states use paper ballots for federal elections

- Bans ranked choice voting
- Bans Universal vote by mail
- Bans partisan voter initiatives

items.content_html:
RT‚ÄÇMark Kretschmann
xAI‚Äôs Grok Imagine has officially claimed the top spot in the Artificial Analysis Video Arena, leading the rankings for both Text-to-Video and Image-to-Video. This leap by @xai puts it ahead of major competitors like Runway Gen-4.5, Kling 2.5 Turbo, and Google‚Äôs Veo 3.1.

Beyond visual quality, Grok Imagine stands out for its native audio generation, a feature it shares with elite models like Sora. Currently available via API, it is positioned as a highly competitive option at $4.20 per minute, significantly undercutting the pricing of high-end rivals like Sora 2 Pro.

Rachael Anderson would have turned 32 yrs old this coming Wednesday, but that will never happen, she was murdered in 2018 by a complete stranger.

Anthony Pardon broke into Rachael's apartment, hogtied her, gagged her, raped, strangled, beat, & stabbed her over 50X with a steak knife in the head, all on her 24th birthday.

Anthony Pardon, who brutally raped & murdered Rachael Anderson, had a horrific rap sheet which included:

1. Conviction for raping a 9-month-old infant

2. Convictions for aggravated robbery, more rapes, attempted murder

3. Registered sex offender + GPS monitored

4. Repeat violent offender

In what universe does an animal like that get another chance? Not in mine. Yet he was released from prison, and he started raping and killing (immediately) all over again.

RIP Rachael
